name: Helicopter Game
short_description: Helicopter Game , the word itself represents the game which has the primary object which is nothing but a helicopter. It can either be a normal helicopter or the army helicopter designed in the game, as per the concept of the game. The Helicopter game comes with different concepts such as Apache helicopter game where the user or the player will be flying the helicopter which we actually see in the pictures these days. These designs are made looking at the real design of the helicopters by the designers. Another Helicopter game that is most famous among the helicopter games is the 2D helicopter game where the user will by flying the helicopter, dodgeing the obstacles on its way. If the Helicopter hits the obstacles in its way, it would blast and the game would restart from the start phase. The aim of the game is to reach the maximum distance along with dodging the obstacles.
